content: **knitted hat in drops soft tweed the piece is worked bottom up with english rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern st-017 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l fits head-size 54/56 - 56/58 cm **materials** drops soft tweed from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 03 sand **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 44 row in height with english rib = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
